price: 26. Markaasaan qabtay gaaladii, ee sidee buu ahaa Ciqaabkeygii (aan ku ciqaabay kuwa Xaqa beeniyey).
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
